Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Structure Description: The sequence showed no homology with other known antimicrobial peptides.
Sequence Information.Comments: The antimicrobial activity was affected by the action of the proteases pronase E and proteinase K, but the absence of the inhibition zone against H. parasuis was only observed when the enzymes were used at 10 mg/ml.

Literature.Title: Characterization of an antimicrobial peptide produced by Bacillus subtilis subsp. spizezinii showing inhibitory activity towards Haemophilus parasuis.
Literature.Author: Teixeira ML, Dalla Rosa A, Brandelli A.
